title: Bootstrap Tooltips
subject: Bootstrap
theory:
## Small Hovers
Tooltips display informative text when users hover over, focus on, or tap an element.

### Initialization Required
**Crucial**: Tooltips are opt-in. You MUST initialize them with JavaScript code: 
`new bootstrap.Tooltip(element)` or enable globally.

### Attributes
* `data-bs-toggle="tooltip"`
* `title="My Tooltip Text"`
* `data-bs-placement="top|bottom|left|right"`

examples.explanation: Boilerplate code needed in your scripts.

common_mistakes.correction: 99% of the time, the developer forgot the JS initialization step.

interview_questions.question: What library does Bootstrap use for positioning tooltips?
interview_questions.answer: Popper.js (now dependent on Floating UI / Popper).

real_world_use_cases.description: An icon acts as a button (e.g., Trash can). Tooltip says 'Delete Item'.

summary: Tooltips provide essential explanations for UI elements without cluttering the design.
